snippet: Valeant and Pershing Square are planning to raise their offer for Allergan. | Profit at Goldman less easy to find. | A.I.G. trial puts Timothy F. Geithner on the hot seat. | Glencore’s chief pursues Rio Tinto.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Another Twist in Allergan Battle
